DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate reliability Melbourne Assessment .
DOC.detailed_description: Children central motor disorder test twice within one week Melbourne Assessment . The assessment video score . At late time point , different raters rate video inter-rater reliability , rater score video intra-rater reliability , rater score repeat assessment video test-retest reliability .
DOC.criteria: central motor disorder ambulant stationary patient Rehabilitation Center Affoltern Albis ability understand test instruction ability sit upright 25 minute minimal activity assess upper limb severe visual and/or auditory problem acute lesion assess upper limb lack compliance
